briefTitle: Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of THL-P in Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase IIa Study of Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Confirmed breast cancer with clinical evidence.
* Life expectancy of at least 4 weeks.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any Uncontrolled infection.
* Lupus erythematosus.
* Malignant tumor.
